動物用藥品名稱: 默之爾雞新城病、傳染性華氏囊病不活化混合疫苗
製造廠名稱: LOHMANN ANIMAL HEALTH INTERNATIONAL (MAINE BIOLOGICAL             LABORATORIES DIVISION)
效能(適應症): 預防雞感染新城病及傳染性華氏囊病。
ingredients: STANDARDIZED BURSAL DISEASE VIRUS 0.02ML; STANDARDIZED NEWCASTLEDISEASE VIRUS 0.01ML; STERILE SALINE 0.1093ML; AQUEOUS EMULSIFIER(40% SOLUTION) 0.0105ML; ADJUVANT (OIL PHASE) 0.350ML; MERTHIOLATE(10% SOLUTION) 0.0002ML;每一劑量含病毒量：BURSAL DISEASE VIRUS10^6.2TCID50; NEWCASTLE DISEASE VIRUS 10^7.7EID50.
